characters.story: Picture standing grain taking form - it asks "Huh? Harvest?" with vivid energy!
The strokes unite to show journey, asking "Cheng? How far?" curiously!
The mouth takes the shape of harmony, asking "Huh? Peace?" curiously!
"Yi, are we moving?" The grain questioned as many bundles began to shift.
The fire stands for autumn, singing "Chyo!" cheerfully with flickering flames dancing high!
The heart takes the shape of gloomy, asking "Cho? Sad?" curiously!
The knife takes the shape of a profit, shouting "Lee!" sharply!
Like a sun, this character means perfume and sings "Shyang!"!
This character represents seasons, shouting "Ji!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
This character represents committee, whispering "Way" softly!
This character represents elegant, shouting "Shyo!" sharply!
Picture to penetrate taking form - it shouts "Toe!" with vivid energy!
"Yo!" Penetrating words enticed sharply, commanding temptation.
This character represents experience, shouting "Lee!" sharply!
A striking symbol for rice that whispers "Mee" softly - a vivid image to remember!
This character represents lost, asking "Mee? Where am I?" curiously!
The strokes unite to show riddle, asking "Mee? What answer?" curiously!
This character represents the kind, shouting "Lay!" sharply!
The bamboo stands for bamboo, asking "Zhoo? Growing?" curiously!
"Shyao!" The young bamboo laughed sharply, giggling with joy.
With bamboo combined with a box, you get box - "Shyang!" rings out cheerfully!
Picture bamboo beside a hand: that's pen, whispering "Bee" softly!
See how the bamboo forms etc.? It whispers "Dung" softly - a vivid image to remember!
"Swan!" Bamboo eyes calculated sharply, computing the answer.
"Da, should I reply?" The bamboo questioned how to fit an answer.
When the tree meets the bamboo, they form strategy, shouting "Tsuh!" sharply!
